title: How to Get Silky Smooth Lips

steps.headline: Drink lots of water.
steps.description: Dehydration causes peeling, chapped lips that will be difficult to remedy.

steps.headline: Refer to the things needed at the bottom of this page.
steps.description: Once you have collected the needed materials you are ready to get soft and silky smooth lips!

steps.headline: Dab a generous amount of petroleum jelly or vaseline onto your lips so that they are heavily coated.
steps.description: It may look a little gross but it works like a dream.

steps.headline: Use the toothbrush to work the vaseline into your lips.
steps.description: Do this by gently moving the toothbrush in circular motions all along your lips. Do this for about a minute. It is a little tedious, but you will love the results afterwards.

steps.headline: Once you've worked the vaseline in for a minute, wipe off your lips with cold water and dab dry with a towel.
Apply chapstick to your lips to keep them silky.
steps.description: For extra moisture try using Carmex. You can find it at any drugstore. It is a nice and heavy moisturizer that is clear and gives your lips a cool sensation. You could also dab on a thin layer of vaseline if you wish.

steps.headline: Repeat this method every day for silky smooth lips that anyone would love to kiss!
